lead_paragraph: Ron Rivera has a chance to become only the fourth man to win a Super Bowl as both a player and head coach, a remarkable feat considering the bleak situation he was in three years ago.

headline.print_headline: Once Risk-Averse Rivera Turns Into 'Riverboat Ron'
headline.main: Once Risk-Averse Rivera Turns Into 'Riverboat Ron'

snippet: Ron Rivera has a chance to become only the fourth man to win a Super Bowl as both a player and head coach, a remarkable feat considering the bleak situation he was in three years ago....
